content: 1 boyfriend cashmere scarf an original absolute knits design copyright 2017 angela juergens instruction materials 410 yards of worsted weight yarn cast on 40 sts used here rowan cashmere col 054 25g/82y 5 balls tapestry row 1 slip first stitch purlwise with needle to weave in ends scissors yarn in front *p2k2 repeat from * to knitting needles size us 8 5 0 mm last 3 sts p2 k1 row 2 slip first stitch purlwise with gauge 18sts/28 row = 4 /4 yarn in front then knit to end of row worked in pattern the gauge is repeat row 1 and 2 until have not critical for this project about 2 yards of yarn left to bind off measurements 8 ½ /65 bind off loosely in pattern stitch pattern stitch count finishing divisible by 4 weave in ends you can block row 1 *k2p2 repeat from * to the scarf by wetting it completely end then pull into shape and let dry row 2 k only completely abbreviations k = knit purlwise means to insert needle from right p = purl to left into stitch as you would for a purl stitch
